attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Throughout the world, independent research bodies have praised homeschooling as one of the best schooling methods, as reflected in the academic and general success of homeschooled pupils. Graham Badman's proposals restrict parents' freedom of choice regarding education and prevent home educators from selecting the teaching methods and curricula that help students learn best.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to uphold the freedom of choice parents enjoy in the UK regarding homeschooling by rejecting Graham Badman's proposed compulsory registration of home educators and the 'minimun standard' requirement.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 


http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Homeschooling


Her Majesty's Government
